about_the_game:
Beverage Hills is an outrageous RPG adventure with a turn-based combat battle system containing some very recent current events.
Beverage Hills is a small town where Cola and his wife Diet live. Cola grew up with his dad being a pharmacist and a vague memory of other family members.
Cola spent most of his childhood & adulthood working for his dad and taking pharmaceutical drugs. There has been a new election and things are about to take a turn for the worst. The president wants to make Ameri-canz great again. Whilst at the time we do not know what this means, Cola’s friend lenon has just come back from the strip club, where cola's wife diet works and reports that the town is on lockdown, and her workmates have been kidnapped. The rumours are that hot chocolate, buck fizz and sparkling wine has been working closely with someone to accumulate canz for a mass national scheme.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, Reference to drugs and Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content
